narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
Applicant wishes to be licensed as a class "C" exhibitor.  The license fee shall be submitted directly to the Region
Office located in Raleigh, NC.  No covered activities permitted until USDA license is issued.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
